title: Software Engineer

responsibilities.summary: Developed a modular Autonomous Lead Generation AI on a Linux VPS, integrating multi-source scraping (Google Maps, Yelp), AI-based verification (GPT-5 Nano), and automated enrichment (Apollo.io) to push high-quality leads directly into Zoho CRM.

details.title: Autonomous Lead Generation AI
details.short_description: A modular AI system for autonomous lead discovery, verification, and CRM injection.
details.long_description:
Developed a modular Autonomous Lead Generation AI on a Linux VPS. The system integrates multi-source scraping (Google Maps, Yelp), AI-based verification using GPT-5 Nano (or GPT-4o-mini), and automated enrichment via Apollo.io to push high-quality, verified leads directly into Zoho CRM.

Key capabilities include:
1. **Multi-Source Scraping:** Aggregates leads from Google Maps and Yelp.
2. **AI Verification:** Uses LLMs to verify lead relevance and quality.
3. **CRM Integration:** Direct sync to Zoho CRM for sales team action.
key_features: Deployed on Linux VPS for 24/7 Operation

responsibilities.summary: Architected and deployed an intelligent invoice processing system using n8n and Google Gemini, automating data extraction from unstructured PDF/image invoices and syncing structured financial records to Airtable for real-time approval workflows.

details.title: Intelligent Invoice Processing Automation
details.short_description: End-to-end invoice automation workflow using n8n and Generative AI.
details.long_description:
Architected and deployed an intelligent invoice processing system using n8n and Google Gemini. The solution automates data extraction from unstructured PDF and image invoices received via Gmail, parses them using GenAI, and syncs structured financial records to Airtable for real-time approval workflows.

Key capabilities include:
1. **AI-Powered Extraction:** Uses Gemini to parse complex invoice layouts.
2. **Seamless Integrations:** Connects Gmail, Drive, and Airtable via n8n.
3. **Human-in-the-Loop:** Airtable powered approval flows.

responsibilities: Engineered a scalable backend microservice in Go (Gin) for a TikTok-like influencer application, implementing modules for JWT authentication, S3 storage, and user engagement using a PostgreSQL database.

responsibilities.summary: Architected a full-stack AI ecosystem on Google Cloud (Firebase Gen 2, Firestore), featuring a modular Python ETL pipeline to ingest and vectorize content (YouTube, Wistia, Ghost) into Pinecone, and a Serverless RAG Backend utilizing GPT-4.1 for intelligent chat, JIT video analysis, and real-time PDF intelligence.

details.title: Serverless RAG Knowledge Engine
details.short_description: A serverless RAG platform with multi-source ingestion and just-in-time video analysis.
details.long_description:
Architected and developed a full-stack AI ecosystem for Product Marketing Alliance (PMA). The system consists of two core components: a robust Data Pipeline that ingests and vectorizes content from multiple platforms (YouTube, Wistia, Ghost CMS), and a Serverless Backend that powers a user-facing AI dashboard for chat, video analysis, and document querying.

**Component 1: Unified Data Pipeline**
Modular Python pipeline for multi-source ingestion, AI enrichment with Instructor, and smart chunking.

**Component 2: Intelligent Backend API**
Firebase Cloud Functions powering advanced RAG, Just-In-Time video analysis, and on-the-fly PDF intelligence.

key_challenges.solution: Engineered an on-demand flow to fetch raw transcripts, generate summaries via GPT-4 realtime, and cache results in Firestore.

responsibilities: Developed the backend MVP for an AI-powered supplier quote system using NestJS, MongoDB, and OpenAI, integrating the Gmail API (OAuth) for sending customized, templated emails.
Architected a solution to integrate a Next.js and GraphQL-based AI web app (Vetsie AI) with a WordPress membership system, restricting application access exclusively to paying subscribers.

responsibilities.summary: Engineered an enterprise-grade financial platform using NestJS, MySQL (TypeORM), and Docker. Built a resilient dual-sync engine for Xero General Ledger data featuring self-healing OAuth2 authentication, advanced rate limiting with exponential backoff, and real-time reporting (Aged Debtors, Cash Flow) via automated Cron jobs.

details.title: Enterprise Xero Integration & Financial Analytics
details.short_description: Robust NestJS platform for synchronizing and analyzing Xero financial data.
details.long_description: Engineered a robust, enterprise-grade backend system using NestJS to bridge Xero Accounting Software with an internal financial machine. The platform serves as a centralized data aggregator, automating the retrieval, normalization, and analysis of financial data for multiple corporate tenants.\n\nKey implementations include a **Dual-Sync Engine** for two-stage data pipelining, **Resilient Xero OAuth2 Management** with self-healing tokens, and an **Advanced Rate Limiting Strategy** to respect strict API limits.
key_features: Resilient Rate Limiting with Exponential Backoff

responsibilities: Created and deployed automated workflows using n8n and Make.com to scrape, clean, and process web data, leveraging Gemini and OpenAI for data enrichment and automated email processing.

responsibilities.summary: Designed and published 'ContextCrafter', a CLI tool (NPM) for preparing large codebases for LLM context windows, featuring intelligent aggregation, custom ignore logic (.contextignore), and architectural tree generation.

details.title: ContextCrafter — Universal Code Aggregator
details.short_description: CLI tool to aggregate codebases for LLM context windows.
details.long_description: Designed and published a developer productivity tool available as an NPM package (`npm install -g context-crafter`). This CLI utility solves the problem of preparing large, complex codebases for LLM context windows by intelligently aggregating source code into a structured, single-file format.\n\nFeatures include **Intelligent Aggregation** (filtering node_modules/git), a **Configuration Engine** for presets, **Custom Ignore Logic** (.contextignore), and **Visual Project Mapping** for architectural context.

responsibilities.summary: Designed and deployed a production-grade AI-to-Human contact center platform using FreeSWITCH, Docker, and React. Implemented real-time SIP/WebRTC call bridging, intelligent agent routing with barge-in capabilities, and a Python (FastAPI/Redis) backend for event-driven call state management.

details.title: Vapi Transfer — AI Contact Center
details.short_description: Real-time AI-to-Human call handoff platform using FreeSWITCH and WebRTC.
details.long_description:
Designed, developed, and deployed a production-grade AI-powered contact center platform enabling seamless real-time call transfer between Vapi AI voice assistants and live human agents. The system supports AI-first outbound calling, live agent monitoring, barge-in/takeover capabilities, and intelligent call routing through a WebRTC-based agent dashboard.

Core components:
1. **FreeSWITCH SIP/WebRTC Platform:** Dockerized cluster handling NAT traversal and RTP.
2. **AI-to-Human Handoff:** Custom dialplans for smooth transfer.
3. **WebRTC Agent Dashboard:** React-based interface for real-time call controls (Barge-in, Monitor).

title: Freelance Backend & AI Developer
responsibilities: Developed and deployed custom Python backends for AI/ML applications, including computer vision and process automation.
Co-developed 'Scam Eye,' a spam detection tool utilizing custom-trained models and OpenAI LLMs.
Built and integrated Node.js (Express) backends with payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and third-party APIs (Twilio).
